results.title: Metformin-mediated mitochondrial protection post-cardiac arrest improves EEG activity and confers neuroprotection and survival benefit.
results.text_hl: For the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Arrest</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@, prior studies have utilized @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a preconditioning manner such that animals are given @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ well before undergoing @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Arrest</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@.

results.title: Metformin preconditioning protects against myocardial stunning and preserves protein translation in a mouse model of cardiac arrest
results.text_hl: To test the cardioprotective effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Arrest</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@, @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were pretreated for 2-weeks with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ before the @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Arrest</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@ procedure (Fig. 1) and compared to untreated arrest @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Metformin prevents brain injury after cardiopulmonary resuscitation by inhibiting the endoplasmic reticulum stress response and activating AMPK-mediated autophagy.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: In a @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Arrest</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006323 @@@CA@@@/CPR @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model, 14-day pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has a neuroprotective effect.
